title: Jo cruse par kurbaan
lyrics:
Jo cruse par kurbaan, o mera Masiha hai
Har zakhm jo uska hai, o mere gunah ka hai -2
-1
Is duniya mein le aaye, (mere gunah usko -2)
Ye zulm sitam us par, (maine hi karaya hai -2)
-2
Insan hai wo kabil, (aur sachcha Khuda wo hai -2)
O pyar ka dariya hai, (sachchai ka rastaa hai -2)
-3
Dene ko tujhe jeevan, (khud mot se hi usne -2)
Kya khub hai kurbaani, (kya pyar anokha hai -2)
